DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy photodynamic therapy 5-aminolevulinic acid intense pulse light vs absence treatment actinic keratoses .
DOC.brief_title: A Photodynamic Therapy Treatment Actinic Keratoses
DOC.detailed_description: This study seek evaluate efficacy photodynamic therapy 5-aminolevulinic acid intense pulse light vs. absence treatment actinic keratoses
DOC.criteria: Age great equal 18 year Have least 4 nonhypertrophic AK lesion body The subject good health The subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator Subjects pregnant lactating Subjects history cutaneous photosensitivity porphyria , hypersensitivity porphyrin , photodermatosis Subjects use photosensitize drug within 1 week study start Subjects use topical medication corticosteroid , alphahydroxyacids retinoids 2 week study entry Subjects systemic steroid therapy within 4 week study entry Subjects receive previous treatment target AKs Subjects systemic treatment chemotherapeutic agent , masoprocol ( Actinex ) , immunotherapy , retinoids within 2 month study entry Subjects prior history hypersensitivity reaction lidocaine Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent
